name: The Palace Guard
description:
Following a corruption scandal, Koroviȼ is being transferred to the Palace District. There, he accompanies three guards on their patrols and over the course of a few days, becomes closer with them.

The game features 3 guards you can get to know over the course of 3 days, and just shy of 10,000 words of dialogue.

Made in a month for the yaoi game jam 2017 by a bunch of folk who didn't know what they were doing. It may not be perfect, but we did our best.
